item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-34 Chances: Shares of LYFT jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after major indices rose LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market The company’s liquidity position raises major concerns Risks: Uber and Lyft announced they will cease operations in Minneapolis due to a new city ordinance increasing wages for app-based drivers The ridesharing industry could become commoditized, affecting LYFT’s competitive position Score:-34 chances characters count - risks characters count = -34
